On the other hand, there are at least three heavens, 2 Cor. 12:2, and they may have come out of the third, into the second. This is the only mention of the tabernacle of the testimony in Revelation, so the throne of God wasnâ€™t there and none of the action related by John up to this point took place thereâ€”there have been several references to the temple, with angels coming out of it, but I doubt that temple and tabernacle are to be equated.)\f* \w Î¿á¼³|strong="G3588"\w* \w á¼¦ÏƒÎ±Î½|strong="G1510"\w*\f + \fr 15:6 \ft Î¿Î¹ Î·ÏƒÎ±Î½ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,eâ…–,f,g,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC Â¦ â€” \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,eâ…—,h\+sup* ğ•»\+sup 47\+sup*â„µA,C,NU,TR\f* \w á¼Î½Î´ÎµÎ´Ï…Î¼Î­Î½Î¿Î¹|strong="G1746"\w* \w Î»Î¯Î½Î¿Î½|strong="G3043"\w* \w ÎºÎ±Î¸Î±Ïá½¸Î½|strong="G2513"\w* \w Î»Î±Î¼Ï€Ïá½¸Î½|strong="G2986"\w*\f + \fr 15:6 \ft Î»Î¹Î½Î¿Î½ ÎºÎ±Î¸Î±ÏÎ¿Î½ Î»Î±Î¼Ï€ÏÎ¿Î½ \+it rell\+it* Â¦ Î»Î¹Î½Î¿Ï…Î½ 23 ğ•»\+sup 47\+sup* Â¦ ~ ÎºÎ±Î¸Î±ÏÎ¿Ï…Ï‚ Î»Î¹Î½Î¿Ï…Ï‚ Î»Î±Î¼Ï€ÏÎ¿Ï…Ï‚ â„µ Â¦ Î»Î¹Î¸Î¿Î½ 23 A,C Â¦ 12 ÎºÎ±Î¹ 3 TR\f* \w ÎºÎ±á½¶|strong="G2532"\w* \w Ï€ÎµÏÎ¹ÎµÎ¶Ï‰ÏƒÎ¼Î­Î½Î¿Î¹|strong="G4024"\w* \w Ï€ÎµÏá½¶|strong="G4012"\w* \w Ï„á½°|strong="G3588"\w* \w ÏƒÏ„Î®Î¸Î·|strong="G4738"\w* \w Î¶ÏÎ½Î±Ï‚|strong="G2223"\w* \w Ï‡ÏÏ…Ïƒá¾¶Ï‚|strong="G5552"\w*.
